column5: I was wondering if any one knows of any good places to fish walleye and pike in south bay area of nippissing? headed up at the end of the month and never really been in this area of nip.

Been there 3 times (for 7 days each time). For walleye, you want to go into the open, if im not mistaken is it hunters bay? Drop a pink jig head and worm about 25-40 feet down and just jig. Youll get some keepers. As for pike just fish the structure and it takes lots of patients and lots of casts. Enjoy La
